channel.title: Shop problem
channel.description:
Hi all
Having problems following this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470354.msg3439024.html#post_A6
not sure about all of it tbh,
first bit,
do i replace the first bit with one already there or copy and paste one below it and then edit it [code]def npcClick2_NPC_ID(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(SHOP_ID)[/code]
second bit, where do i paste this [code]import server.util.ScriptManager;[/code]
third bit where do i paste this [code]ScriptManager.loadScripts();[/code]
in this [code]public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) throws NullPointerException, IOException {[/code]
plz help :/

item.title: Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @mrplumb mrplumb
item.description:
@mrplumb wrote:

EDIT: When i runserver (complier is fine) it does this message

Loading scripts... .\Data\scripts\player\eat\eat.py .\Data\scripts\player\items\spade.py .\Data\scripts\player\npc\npc1.py .\Data\scripts\player\npc\npc2.py Exception in thread "main" Traceback (innermost last): (no code object) at line 0 SyntaxError: ('invalid syntax', ('<iostream>', 21, 21, 'def npcClick2_583(c,520) :')) Press any key to continue . . .

here is my npc2 file that i edited, the bottom bit is the one i added in

[code]from server.util import ScriptManager

def npcClick2_522(c, npcId):
c.getShops().openShop(1)

def npcClick2_523(c, npcId):
c.getShops().openShop(1)

def npcClick2_546(c, npcId):
c.getShops().openShop(7)

def npcClick2_548(c, npcId):
c.getShops().openShop(8)

def npcClick2_537(c, npcId):
c.getShops().openShop(9)

def npcClick2_582(c,npcId):
c.getShops().openShop(48)

def npcClick2_583(c,520):
c.getShops().openShop(18)
[/code]

plz help

Read full topic

item.title: Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @Dean1 Dean.
item.description:
@Dean1 wrote:

[quote=“mrplumb, post:1, topic:402349”]Hi all

Having problems following this guide

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

not sure about all of it tbh,

first bit,

do i replace the first bit with one already there or copy and paste one below it and then edit it

def npcClick2_NPC_ID(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(SHOP_ID)

second bit, where do i paste this import server.util.ScriptManager;

third bit where do i paste this ScriptManager.loadScripts();

in this public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) throws NullPointerException, IOException {

plz help :/[/quote]

  1. Yes C+P then edit it.
  2. Open up server.java and add it at the top or where ever the other imports are located.
  3. You add this into the void called:

public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) throws NullPointerException, IOException {

After the “{”

Goodluck!

Read full topic
